articles.content:
Oldham moved to within a point of safety in the National League with an entertaining win over Torquay.

articles.description: Dagny Brynjarsdottir and Hawa Cissoko were on target in West Ham's London-derby win over Tottenham in the Women's Super League.
articles.content:

articles.description: Rangers roar to a first SWPL Cup success by defeating seven-time winners Hibernian at Tynecastle.
articles.content:
Lizzie Arnot rocketed an unstoppable finish into the top corner to open the scoring
